title: Go With Me
description: I, Daphne Fox, have a few things to confess:1. I hate Nick Brady. Loathe. Abhor. Can’t stand him 95% of the time.2. That other 5%? I’m not talking about that at all.3. People think I’m lucky for surviving the car crash. I disagree.4. Nick is the only guy who makes my nightmares go away.5. I won’t love him, though. Love is not worth the pain.I, Nick Brady, have a few confessions of my own:1. I don’t hate Daphne Fox. At all.2. I find her scar sexy. Just like the rest of her.3. I may be her older brother’s best friend, but that’s not going to stop me.4. I love her.5. And I’m going to do everything I can to have her.New Adult/Contemporary Romance with a HEA - Recommended for ages 17 and older.
author: Elyssa Patrick
